title: Paul Koehler from Silverstein
itunes:title: Paul Koehler from Silverstein
description:
Episode 186 - We have almost collected all of the members of Silverstein! This week we chop it up with the drummer, Paul Koehelr who is a very old friend and the main business focus behind the band. We discuss their longevity, the life of a drummer and how to find inspiration when you've been at it for so long. A very free flowing conversation that lead to some real interesting places. Enjoy! - - - -This weeks show is brought to you by Loot Crate and their amazing pop culture subscription box, sign up now and receive $3 off your first box.Another partner for the show is Zevia, the clear, zero calorie soda that's naturally sweetened. Taste the difference and enter for a chance to win a free six pack of soda! Follow the show on Twitter

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
